# 🕵️ Sleuth Helpful

As the Sleuth, you can gain info from dead bodies.

Optionally, you may also gain the killer's role.

Not assigned to Detective or Mortician.

  • Max
    • Set the Maximum amount of Sleuths that can be in a match
  • Spawn Chance
    • Set the chance of a Sleuth spawning
  • Impostors can become Sleuths
    • ON: Impostors can become Sleuths
    • OFF: Impostors cannot become Sleuths
  • Neutrals can become Sleuths
    • ON: Neutrals can become Sleuths
    • OFF: Neutrals cannot become Sleuths
  • Crewmates can become Sleuths
    • ON: Crewmates can become Sleuths
    • OFF: Crewmates cannot become Sleuths
  • Can find the role of the killer
    • ON: the Sleuth can find the role of the killer
    • OFF: the Sleuth cannot find the role of the killer

From: TBD
